sentences.sContent: the disaffected youth from poor neighborhoods
sentences.sCn: 贫民区那些心存不满的年轻人

synos.tran: 不满的；有叛意的；愤愤不平的
使疏远；使不友爱（disaffect的过去分词）

remMethod.val: dis(不) + affect(感动) → 不再感动 → 使不满

words.tran: 使疏远；使不满意；使成为敌人

trans.tranCn: 抱不平的, 有叛意的, 不服的
trans.tranOther: not satisfied with your government, leader etc, and therefore no longer loyal to them or no longer believing they can help you
